actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to remove excise tax on bus parts and accessories and to remove excise tax on certain items used in connection with intercity, local, and school buses.

summary.text: Bus Excise Tax Repeal Act - Repeals the excise taxes on certain bus parts and accessories, and on tires, tubes and tread rubber used in connection with intercity, local and school buses. Provides for the refund of excise taxes paid on lubricating oil, gasoline and other motor fuels when used in such buses.

titles.title: A bill to remove excise tax on bus parts and accessories and to remove excise tax on certain items used in connection with intercity, local, and school buses.
